about_the_game:
Forgotten Memories is a choice-driven adult visual novel where mystery, passion, and intrigue intertwine. As the protagonist, you awaken after a mysterious illness, having lost all memories of your past. Returning to your luxurious estate, you are welcomed by three beautiful maids, each with their own unique personalities and hidden desires. As you explore your relationships with these women, your decisions will shape the course of the story, leading to a variety of explicit and emotional outcomes.

Key Features:

- Adult Content with Multiple Endings: Dive deep into mature themes, exploring romance, lust, and intimate connections with the characters. Depending on your choices, you will unlock different endings, including erotic encounters and darker secrets.

- Branching Narrative: Every decision impacts the story. Will you rekindle old flames, develop new bonds, or fall into jealousy and rivalry? The path you choose determines your fate with each heroine.

- Unique Characters with Rich Backgrounds: Get to know Eleanor, the stern yet sensual head maid; Emily, your lively childhood friend and gardener; and Chloe, the earnest cook. Each character offers their own storyline, emotions, and desires.

- Beautifully Illustrated Scenes: Featuring high-quality art and detailed environments, the game brings the mansion and its occupants to life. From intimate moments in the bedroom to quiet conversations in the garden, every scene is crafted with care.

- Romance, Mystery, and Suspense: Beyond the steamy encounters, uncover the truth behind your memory loss and the secrets the maids are hiding. Can you regain your memories and find true love, or will you fall into a darker path?

Forgotten Memories delivers an emotionally charged and sensually rich narrative that keeps you invested in the characters and their stories. With multiple paths to explore, no two playthroughs are the same.
